property.Syntax: FIXED_DATE = [YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI:SS (or the default Oracle date format) | NONE]

section: FIXED_DATE enables you to set a constant date that SYSDATE will always return instead of the current date. To undo a fixed date setting, specify FIXED_DATE=NONE. This parameter is useful primarily for testing. The value can be in the format shown above or in the default Oracle date format, without a time.
